summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Section 1 of the Seattle Building Code (Ordinance 108508), Section 2 of the Seattle Electrical Code (Ordinance 108482), and Section 2 of the Seattle Mechanical Code (Ordinance 106166) as of February 20, 1980 to reference the applicable provisions of the Seattle Code for Energy Conservation in New Building Construction (Ordinance 108500) and establish priority of provisions in the event of conflict.
